name: RecipeBuddy
0:
”Alexa, ask Recipe Buddy how to make chicken marsala.”
”Alexa, ask Recipe Buddy to find me a recipe for philly cheese steak.”
”Alexa, ask Recipe Buddy how do I cook pad thai?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: recipe buddy
des: Recipe Buddy helps you out in the kitchen! Search thousands of recipes and have Recipe Buddy walk you through them step by step. No registration or login is required.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
